overview: A friendly note, a bottle of wine and an expression of gratitude for a good stay. The camera slowly moves around the interior of the elegant house that Emilia rented via an online service to some unknown individuals for a short stay. Everything seems to be fine, but after the screening the viewer might want to think twice whether they would like to make some extra money in the same way. It is a black comedy from Canada directed and edited in a unique way. This modest and quite simple story surprises the viewer with unobvious editing and disturbing climate. The director was inspired by her own experiences related to renting a flat. Currently, the artist is working on her feature debut â€“ a horror movie.
title: Hearth
